text: <@U6W3H6YN8> Anything on this?  It's fine if you're nowhere near releasing anything, I just need to know so that I can make a recco to our team on best workflow with the existing tools.

Sorry for the delay. No definitive timeframe, but this slack group will be the first to know about progress. It is not all going to be solved at once, we will make incremental progress, have developers use it, iterate, and keep working based on feedback. We are not too far from being able to have something to play with.
Great to hear! Thanks for the info.  Again, please let me know if my team can help in any way.
